20101224082336.000|20101224082336.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101224082336.000|20101224082338.000|CC1|>> Rose: AND WHEN HE HAD THE    
20101224082338.000|20101224082341.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP WITH HAROLD        
20101224082341.000|20101224082343.000|CC1|MacMILAN, HAROLD MacMILAN WAS   
20101224082343.000|20101224082345.000|CC1|SOMEHOW CONNECTED TO THE FAMILY.
20101224082345.000|20101224082348.000|CC1|>> HE WAS THE HUSBAND OF MY...  
20101224082348.000|20101224082351.000|CC1|SORRY.                          
20101224082351.000|20101224082353.000|CC1|HE WAS RELATED TO MY HUSBAND'S  
20101224082353.000|20101224082354.000|CC1|AUNT.                           
20101224082354.000|20101224082356.000|CC1|>> Rose: AND HERE IS THE FACT.  
20101224082356.000|20101224082358.000|CC1|THE FACT IS THAT HAROLD MacMILAN
20101224082358.000|20101224082400.000|CC1|TO YOU WAS UNCLE HAROLD.        
20101224082400.000|20101224082400.000|CC1|>> YES, HE WAS.                 
20101224082400.000|20101224082402.000|CC1|>> Rose: IT IS SAID THAT JACK   
20101224082402.000|20101224082403.000|CC1|KENNEDY, THE PRESIDENT OF THE   
20101224082403.000|20101224082404.000|CC1|UNITED STATES, REFERRED TO THE

20101224082406.000|20101224082407.000|CC1|HAROLD MacMILAN, AS UNCLE

20101224082413.000|20101224082415.000|CC1|UNCLE HAROLD THAT.
